content: The only way you put anybody else over Westbrook is because you’re using an incorrect bias towards either 1) their overall team record is better — like the other guys — or 2) their overall playing power is better — like Lebron vs anyone else right now. But MVP is for best individual statistical performance, so even if The Brow averaged 40-20 next year yet still didn’t even make the playoffs, that’s an all-time great MVP season. And Westbrook’s triple-dub year is a no-brainer.
